- "The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones" (2013) - It features a talented cast, including Aidan Turner and CCH Pounder. The plot follows Clary Fray, who discovers that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.
I hope these recommendations help you find something enjoyable to watch!
